   Śatasāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā II 4	Śata sAhasrikA PrajQApAramitA II 4
   [K. 171a1, N. 326b5, T. 266a1, P. A 156a6, Ch. 557b13]	[K. 171a1, N. 326b5, T. 266a1, P. A 156a6, Ch. 557b13]
   atha khalu śakro devāṇām indro bhagavantam etad avocat: āścaryaṃ bhagavan	aTa Kalu SakraH devANAm indraH Bagavantam etat avocat: AScaryam Bagavan
   yāvac ceyaṃ bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇanto dhārayanto	yAvat ca iyam boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH prajQApAramitAm udgRhNantaH DArayantaH 
   vācayantaḥ paryavāpnuvanto yoniśaś ca manasikurvanta iha dhārmikān guṇān	vAcayantaH paryavApnuvantaH yoniSas ca manasikurvantaH iha DArmikAn guNAn
   parigṛhṇanti sattvāṃś ca paripācayanti, buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayanti	parigRhNanti sattvAn ca paripAcayanti, budDa kzetram pariSoDayanti
   buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti, buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsīnāḥ	budDa kzetrAt budDa kzetram saMkrAmanti, budDAn BagavataH paryupAsInAH
   yaiś ca kuśalamūlair ākāṅkṣanti tān buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartuṃ	yEH ca kuSala mUlEH AkAFkzanti tAn budDAn BagavataH satkartum
   gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tān yeṣāṃ kuśalamūlāni samṛdhyanti yac ca	gurukartum mAnayitum pUjayitum tAn yezAm kuSala mUlAni samRDyanti yat ca
   teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śṛṇvati sa tāvan na	tezAm budDAnAm BagavatAm antikAt Darmam SRNvati sa tAvat na
   vipramuṣyati, yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā bhavanti,	vipramuzyati, yAvat anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDAH Bavanti,
   kulasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti, jananīsaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti,	kula saMpadam ca parigRhNanti, jananI saMpadam ca parigRhNanti,
   janmasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti parivārasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti	janma saMpadam ca parigRhNanti parivAra saMpadam ca parigRhNanti
   lakṣaṇasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti, prabhāsaṃpadaṃ parigṛhṇanti,	lakzaNa saMpadam ca parigRhNanti, praBA saMpadam parigRhNanti,
   cakṣuḥsaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti svarasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti	cakzuH saMpadam ca parigRhNanti svara saMpadam ca parigRhNanti
   samādhisaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti dhāraṇīsaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti	samADi saMpadam ca parigRhNanti DAraNI saMpadam ca parigRhNanti
   upāyakauśalyena cātmānaṃ buddhavigraham abhinirmāya lokadhātor lokadhātuṃ	upAya kOSalyena ca AtmAnam budDa vigraham aBinirmAya lokaDAtoH lokaDAtum
   saṃkrāmanti, yatra buddhānāṃ bhagavatām anutpādaḥ prādurbhāvo nāsti, te	saMkrAmanti, yatra budDAnAm BagavatAm anutpAdaH prAdurBAvaH nAsti, te
   tatra gatvā dānapāramitāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante, śīlapāramitāyā varṇaṃ	tatra gatvA dAna pAramitAyAH varNam BAzante, SIla pAramitAyAH varNam
   bhāṣante, kṣāntipāramitāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante, vīryapāramitāyā varṇaṃ	BAzante, kzAnti pAramitAyAH varNam BAzante, vIrya pAramitAyAH varNam
   bhāṣante, dhyānapāramitāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante, prajñāpāramitāyā varṇaṃ	BAzante, DyAna pAramitAyAH varNam BAzante, prajQApAramitAyAH varNam
   bhāṣante.	BAzante.
   adhyātmaśūnyatāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante, bahirdhāśūnyatāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante,	aDyAtma SUnyatAyAH varNam BAzante, bahirDA SUnyatAyAH varNam BAzante,
   adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante, śūnyatāśūnyatāyā varṇaṃ	aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatAyAH varNam BAzante, SUnyatA SUnyatAyAH varNam
   bhāṣante, mahāśūnyatāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante, paramārthaśūnyatāyā varṇaṃ	BAzante, mahA SUnyatAyAH varNam BAzante, parama arTa SUnyatAyAH varNam
   bhāṣante, saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante, asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā varṇaṃ	BAzante, saMskRta SUnyatAyAH varNam BAzante, asaMskRta SUnyatAyAH varNam
   bhāṣante, atyantaśūnyatāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante, anavarāgraśūnyatāyā varṇaṃ	BAzante, atyanta SUnyatAyAH varNam BAzante, anavara agra SUnyatAyAH varNam
   bhāṣante, anavakāraśūnyatāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante, prakṛtiśūnyatāyā varṇaṃ	BAzante, anavakAra SUnyatAyAH varNam BAzante, prakRti SUnyatAyAH varNam
   bhāṣante, sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante, svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā	BAzante, sarva Darma SUnyatAyAH varNam BAzante, sva lakzaNa SUnyatAyAH 
   (ŚsP_II 4_2) varṇaṃ bhāṣante, anupalambhaśūnyatāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante,	(ŚsP_II 4_2) varNam BAzante, anupalamBa SUnyatAyAH varNam BAzante,
   abhāvaśūnyatāyā varṇaṃ bhāsante, svabhāvaśūnyatāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante,	aBAva SUnya tAyAH varNam BAsante, svaBAva SUnyatAyAH varNam BAzante,
   abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante.	aBAva svaBAva SUnyatAyAH varNam BAzante.
   caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante, caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante,	caturNAm DyAnAnAm varNam BAzante, caturNAm apramANAnAm varNam BAzante,
   catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante, pañcānām abhijñānāṃ varṇaṃ	catasRNAm ArUpya samApattInAm varNam BAzante, paQcAnAm aBijQAnAm varNam
   bhāṣante, caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante, caturṇāṃ	BAzante, caturNAm smRti upasTAnAnAm varNam BAzante, caturNAm
   samyakprahāṇānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante, caturṇām ṛddhipādānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante,	samyak prahANAnAm varNam BAzante, caturNAm RdDi pAdAnAm varNam BAzante,
   pañcānām indriyāṇāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante, pañcānāṃ balānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante,	paQcAnAm indriyANAm varNam BAzante, paQcAnAm balAnAm varNam BAzante,
   saptānāṃ bodhyaṅgānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante, āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya varṇaṃ	saptAnAm boDi aFgAnAm varNam BAzante, Arya azwa aFgasya mArgasya varNam
   bhāṣante, caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante, aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ varṇaṃ	BAzante, caturNAm Arya satyAnAm varNam BAzante, azwAnAm vimokzANAm varNam
   bhāṣante, navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante,	BAzante, nava anupUrva vihAra samApattInAm varNam BAzante,
   śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante, samādhīnaṃ varṇaṃ	SUnyatA nimitta apraNihita vimokza muKAnAm varNam BAzante, sama aDInam varNam
   bhāṣante, dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante, daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ varṇaṃ	BAzante, DAraNImuKAnAm varNam BAzante, daSAnAm taTAgata balAnAm varNam
   bhāṣante, caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante, catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ	BAzante, caturNAm vESAradyAnAm varNam BAzante, catasRNAm pratisaMvidAm
   varṇaṃ bhāsante, mahāmaitryā varṇaṃ bhāṣante, mahākaruṇāyā varṇaṃ	varNam BAsante, mahAmEtryAH varNam BAzante, mahA karuNAyAH varNam
   bhāṣante, aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante.	BAzante, azwAdaSAnAm AveNika budDa DarmANAm varNam BAzante.
   upāyakauśalyena ca sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayanti triṣu ca yāneṣu sattvān	upAya kOSalyena ca sattveByaH Darmam deSayanti trizu ca yAnezu sattvAn
   vinayanti, śrāvakayāne pratyekabuddhayāne mahāyāne.	vinayanti, SrAvaka yAne pratyekabudDa yAne mahAyAne.
   atha śakro devānām indraḥ punar bhagavantam etad avocat: āścaryaṃ bhagavan	aTa SakraH devAnAm indraH punar Bagavantam etat avocat: AScaryam Bagavan
   yāvac cedaṃ prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītayā sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parigṛhītā	yAvat ca idam prajQApAramitayA parigRhItayA sarvAH zaw pAramitAH parigRhItA
   bhavanti.	Bavanti.
   adhyātmaśūnyatāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti, bahirdhāśūnyatāḥ parigṛhītā	aDyAtma SUnyatAH parigRhItAH Bavanti, bahirDA SUnyatAH parigRhItA
   bhavanti, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti, śūnyatāśūnyatāḥ	Bavanti, aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatAH parigRhItAH Bavanti, SUnyatA SUnyatAH
   parigṛhītā bhavanti, mahāśūnyatāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti, paramārthaśūnyatāḥ	parigRhItAH Bavanti, mahA SUnyatAH parigRhItAH Bavanti, parama arTa SUnyatAH
   parigṛhītā bhavanti, saṃskṛtaśūnyatāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti,	parigRhItAH Bavanti, saMskRta SUnyatAH parigRhItAH Bavanti,
   asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti, atyantaśūnyatāḥ parigṛhītā	asaMskRta SUnyatAH parigRhItAH Bavanti, atyanta SUnyatAH parigRhItA
   bhavanti, anavarāgraśūnyatāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti, anavakāraśūnyatāḥ	Bavanti, anavara agra SUnyatAH parigRhItAH Bavanti, anavakAra SUnyatAH
   parigṛhitā bhavanti, prakṛtiśūnyatāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti,	parigRhitAH Bavanti, prakRti SUnyatAH parigRhItAH Bavanti,
   sarvadharmaśūnyatāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti, svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāḥ parigṛhītā	sarva Darma SUnyatAH parigRhItAH Bavanti, sva lakzaNa SUnyatAH parigRhItA
   bhavanti, anupalambhaśūnyatāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti, abhāvaśūnyatāḥ	Bavanti, anupalamBa SUnyatAH parigRhItAH Bavanti, aBAva SUnyatAH
   parigṛhītā bhavanti, svabhāvaśūnyatāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti,	parigRhItAH Bavanti, svaBAva SUnyatAH parigRhItAH Bavanti,
   abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti.	aBAva svaBAva SUnyatAH parigRhItAH Bavanti.
   smṛtyupasthānāni parigṛhītāni bhavanti, samyakprahāṇāni parigṛhītāni	smRti upasTAnAni parigRhItAni Bavanti, samyak prahANAni parigRhItAni
   (ŚsP_II 4_3) bhavanti, ṛddhipādāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti, indriyāṇi	(ŚsP_II 4_3) Bavanti, RdDi pAdAH parigRhItAH Bavanti, indriyANi
   parigṛhītāni bhavanti, balāni parigṛhītāni bhavanti, bodhyaṅgāni	parigRhItAni Bavanti, balAni parigRhItAni Bavanti, boDi aFgAni
   parigṛhītāni bhavanti, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ parigṛhīto bhavati, āryasatyāni	parigRhItAni Bavanti, Arya azwa aFgaH mArgaH parigRhItaH Bavati, Arya satyAni
   parigṛhītāni bhavanti, dhyānāni parigṛhītāni bhavanti, apramāṇāni	parigRhItAni Bavanti, DyAnAni parigRhItAni Bavanti, apramANAni
   parigṛhītāni bhavanti, ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti, vimokṣāḥ	parigRhItAni Bavanti, ArUpya samApattayaH parigRhItAH Bavanti, vimokzAH
   parigṛhītā bhavanti, anupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti,	parigRhItAH Bavanti, anupUrva vihAra samApattayaH parigRhItAH Bavanti,
   śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni parigṛhītāni bhavanti, abhijñāḥ	SUnyatA nimitta apraNihita vimokza muKAni parigRhItAni Bavanti, aBijQAH
   parigṛhītā bhavanti, samādhayaḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti, dhāraṇīmukhāni	parigRhItAH Bavanti, samADayaH parigRhItAH Bavanti, DAraNI muKAni
   parigṛhītāni bhavanti, tathāgatabalāni parigṛhītāni bhavanti, vaiśāradyāni	parigRhItAni Bavanti, taTAgata balAni parigRhItAni Bavanti, vESAradyAni
   parigṛhītani bhavanti, pratisaṃvidaḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti, mahāmaitrī	parigRhItani Bavanti, pratisaMvidaH parigRhItAH Bavanti, mahA mEtrI
   parigṛhītā bhavati, mahākaruṇā parigṛhītā bhavanti, āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ	parigRhItA Bavati, mahA karuNA parigRhItAH Bavanti, AveNika budDa DarmAH
   parigṛhītā bhavanti, srotraāpattiphalaṃ parigṛhītaṃ bhavati,	parigRhItAH Bavanti, srotraApatti Palam parigRhItam Bavati,
   sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ parigṛhītaṃ bhavati, anāgāmiphalaṃ parigṛhītaṃ bhavati,	sakRdAgAmi Palam parigRhItam Bavati, anAgAmi Palam parigRhItam Bavati,
   arhattvaṃ parigṛhītaṃ bhavati, pratyekabodhiḥ parigṛhītā bhavati,	arhat tvam parigRhItam Bavati, pratyeka boDiH parigRhItA Bavati,
   mārgākārajñatā parigṛhītā bhavati, sarvākārajñatā parigṛhītā bhavati.	mArga AkAra jQa tA parigRhItA Bavati, sarva AkAra jQa tA parigRhItA Bavati.
   evam ukte bhagavāñ chakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat: evam etat	evam ukte BagavAn Cakram devAnAm indram etat avocat: evam etat 
   kauśikaivam etat, prajñāpāramitayā kauśika parigṛhītayā sarvāḥ ṣaṭ	kOSika evam etat, prajQApAramitayA kOSika parigRhItayA sarvAH zax 
   pāramitāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti.	pAramitAH parigRhItAH Bavanti.
   adhyātmaśūnyatā parigṛhītā bhavati, bahirdhāśūnyatā parigṛhītā bhavati,	aDyAtma SUnyatA parigRhItA Bavati, bahirDA SUnyatA parigRhItA Bavati,
   adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā parigṛhītā bhavati, śūnyatāśūnyatā parigṛhītā	aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA parigRhItA Bavati, SUnyatA SUnyatA parigRhItA

   bhavati, saṃskṛtaśūnyatā parigṛhītā bhavati, asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā parigṛhītā	Bavati, saMskRta SUnyatA parigRhItA Bavati, asaMskRta SUnyatA parigRhItA

   bhavati, anavakāraśūnyatā parigṛhītā bhavati, prakṛtiśūnyatā parigṛhītā	Bavati, anavakAra SUnyatA parigRhItA Bavati, prakRti SUnyatA parigRhItA
   bhavati, sarvadharmaśūnyatā parigṛhītā bhavati, svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā	Bavati, sarva Darma SUnyatA parigRhItA Bavati, sva lakzaNa SUnyatA
   parigṛhītā bhavati, anupalambhaśūnyatā parigṛhītā bhavati, abhāvaśūnyatā	parigRhItA Bavati, anupalamBa SUnyatA parigRhItA Bavati, aBAva SUnyatA

   bhavanti, ṛddhipādāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti, indriyāṇi parigṛhītāni bhavanti,	Bavanti, RdDi pAdAH parigRhItAH Bavanti, indriyANi parigRhItAni Bavanti,
   balāni parigṛhītāni bhavanti, bodhyaṅgāni parigṛhītāni bhavanti,	balAni parigRhItAni Bavanti, boDi aFgAni parigRhItAni Bavanti,
   āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ parigṛhīto bhavanti, āryasatyāni parigṛhītāni bhavanti,	Arya azwa aFgaH mArgaH parigRhItaH Bavanti, Arya satyAni parigRhItAni Bavanti,
   dhyānāni parigṛhītāni bhavanti, apramāṇāni parigṛhītāni bhavanti,	DyAnAni parigRhItAni Bavanti, apramANAni parigRhItAni Bavanti,

   śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni parigṛhītāni bhavanti, abhijñāḥ	SUnyatA nimitta apraNihita vimokza muKAni parigRhItAni Bavanti, aBijQAH
   parigṛhītā bhavanti, samādhayaḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti, dhāraṇīmukhāni	parigRhItAH Bavanti, samADayaH parigRhItAH Bavanti, DAraNI muKAni
   parigṛhītāni bhavanti, tathāgatabalāni parigṛhītāni bhavanti, vaiśāradyāni	parigRhItAni Bavanti, taTAgata balAni parigRhItAni Bavanti, vESAradyAni

   arhattvaṃ parigṛhītaṃ bhavati, pratyekabodhiḥ parigṛhītā bhavati,	arhat tvam parigRhItam Bavati, pratyeka boDiH parigRhItA Bavati,
   mārgākārajñatā parigṛhītā bhavati, sarvākārajñatā parigṛhītā bhavati.	mArga AkAra jQa tA parigRhItA Bavati, sarva AkAra jQa tA parigRhItA Bavati.

   punar aparaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītayā dhārayitayā vācitayā	punar aparam kOSika prajQApAramitayA parigRhItayA DArayitayA vAcitayA

   mṛṣāvādavairamaṇyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate, ye cānye mṛṣāvādāt prativiratā	mRzA vAda vEramaNyAH ca varNam BAzizyate, ye ca anye mRzAvAdAt prativiratA

   (ŚsP_II 4_11) paiśūnyāt prativiratā bhaviṣyanti, teṣām api varṇavādī	(ŚsP_II 4_11) pESUnyAt prativiratA Bavizyanti, tezAm api varNa vAdI
   bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ, ātmanā ca pāruṣyāt prativirato bhaviṣyati, parāṃś	Bavizyati sa manujQaH, AtmanA ca pAruzyAt prativirataH Bavizyati, parAn= 
   ca pāruṣyavairamaṇyāṃ samādāyati, pārūṣyavairamaṇyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,	ca pAruzya vEramaNyAm samAdAyati, pArUzya vEramaNyAH ca varNam BAzizyate,

   samanujñaḥ, ātmanā ca saṃbhinnapralāpāt prativirato bhaviṣyati, parāṃś ca	sa manujQaH, AtmanA ca saMBinna pralApAt prativirataH Bavizyati, parAn ca

   varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.	varNa vAdI Bavizyati samanujQaH.

   ātmanā ca sarvasamādhīn samāpatsyate parāṃś ca sarvasamādhisamāpattau	AtmanA ca sarva samADIn samApatsyate parAn ca sarva samADi samApattO
   samādāpayiṣyati, sarvasamādhisamāpatteś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate, ye cānye	samAdApayizyati, sarva samADi samApatteH ca varNam BAzizyate, ye ca anye
   sarvasamādhīn samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,	sarva samADIn samApatsyante tezAm api varNa vAdI Bavizyati samanujQaH,
   ātmanā ca dhāraṇīpratilabdho bhāviṣyati, parāṃś ca dhāraṇīpratilambhāya	AtmanA ca DAraNI pratilabDaH BAvizyati, parAn ca DAraNI pratilamBAya
   samādāpayiṣyati, dhāraṇīpratilambhasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate, ye cānye	samAdApayizyati, DAraNI pratilamBasya ca varNam BAzizyate, ye ca anye
   dhāraṇīpratilambhā bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati	DAraNI pratilamBAH BAvayizyanti tezAm api varNa vAdI Bavizyati
   samanujñaḥ.	samanujQaH.
   ātmanā ca prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyate, parāṃś ca prathame (ŚsP_II 4_14)	AtmanA ca praTamam DyAnam samApatsyate, parAn ca praTame (ŚsP_II 4_14)
   dhyāne samādāpayiṣyati, prathamadhyānasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate, ye cānye	DyAne samAdApayizyati, praTama DyAnasya ca varNam BAzizyate, ye ca anye
   prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,	praTamam DyAnam samApatsyante tezAm api varNa vAdI Bavizyati samanujQaH,
   ātmanā ca dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyate, parāṃś ca dvitīye dhyāne	AtmanA ca dvitIyam DyAnam samApatsyate, parAn ca dvitIye DyAne
   samādāpayiṣyati, dvitīyadhyānasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate, ye cānye dvitīyaṃ	samAdApayizyati, dvitIya DyAnasya ca varNam BAzizyate, ye ca anye dvitIyam
   dhyānaṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ, ātmanā ca	DyAnam samApatsyante tezAm api varNa vAdI Bavizyati sa manujQaH, AtmanA ca
   tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyate, parāṃś ca tṛtīye dhyāne samādāpayiṣyati,	tRtIyam DyAnam samApatsyate, parAn ca tRtIye DyAne samAdApayizyati,
   tṛtīyadhyānasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate, ye cānye tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ	tRtIya DyAnasya ca varNam BAzizyate, ye ca anye tRtIyam DyAnam
   samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ, ātmanā ca	samApatsyante tezAm api varNa vAdI Bavizyati sa manujQaH, AtmanA ca
   caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyate, parāṃś ca caturthe dhyāne samādāpayiṣyati,	caturTam DyAnam samApatsyate, parAn ca caturTe DyAne samAdApayizyati,
   caturthadhyānasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate, ye cānye caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ	caturTa DyAnasya ca varNam BAzizyate, ye ca anye caturTam DyAnam
   samāpatsyate teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.	samApatsyate tezAm api varNa vAdI Bavizyati samanujQaH.
   ātmanā ca maitrī samāpatsyate, parāṃś ca maitrīsamāpattau samādāpayiṣyati,	AtmanA ca mEtrI samApatsyate, parAn ca mEtrI samApattO samAdApayizyati,
   maitrīsamāpatteś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate, ye cānye mahāmaitrī samāpatsyante	mEtrI samApatteH ca varNam BAzizyate, ye ca anye mahA mEtrI samApatsyante
   teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ, ātmanā ca karuṇā samāpatsyate,	tezAm api varNa vAdI Bavizyati sa manujQaH, AtmanA ca karuNA samApatsyate,
   parāṃś ca karuṇāyāṃ samādāpayiṣyati, karuṇāsamāpatteś ca varṇaṃ	parAn ca karuNAyAm samAdApayizyati, karuNA samApatteH ca varNam
   bhāṣiṣyate, ye cānye karuṇā samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati	BAzizyate, ye ca anye karuNA samApatsyante tezAm api varNa vAdI Bavizyati
   samanujñaḥ, ātmanā ca muditāṃ samāpatsyate, parāṃś ca muditāsamāpattau	sa manujQaH, AtmanA ca muditAm samApatsyate, parAn ca mudita asamApattO
   samādāpayiṣyati, muditāsamāpatteś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate, ye cānye muditāṃ	samAdApayizyati, mudita asamApatteH ca varNam BAzizyate, ye ca anye muditAm
   samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ, ātmanā copekṣāṃ	samApatsyante tezAm api varNa vAdI Bavizyati sa manujQaH, AtmanA ca upekzAm
   samāpatsyate, parāṃś copekṣāsamāpattau samādāpayiṣyati, upekṣāsamāpatteś	samApatsyate, parAn ca upekzA samApattO samAdApayizyati, upekzA samApatteH 
   ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate, ye cānye upekṣāṃ samāpatsyate teṣām api varṇavādī	ca varNam BAzizyate, ye ca anye upekzAm samApatsyate tezAm api varNa vAdI
   bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.	Bavizyati samanujQaH.
   ātmanā cākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpatsyate, parāṃś	AtmanA ca AkASa AnantyAyatana samApattim samApatsyate, parAn=

   bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ, ātmanā ca sadopekṣāvihārī bhaviṣyati, parāṃś ca	Bavizyati sa manujQaH, AtmanA ca sadA upekzA vihArI Bavizyati, parAn ca

   lābhinaḥ, ye navānām anupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ lābhinaḥ ye catasṛṇāṃ	lABinaH, ye navAnAm anupUrva vihAra samApattInAm lABinaH ye catasRNAm

   aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ.	azwAdaSa AveNikAH budDa DarmAH.
   anye 'py aparimāṇā buddhadharmā yatra prajñāpāramitāyām antargatā te py	anye api aparimANAH budDa DarmA yatra prajQApAramitAyAm antargatA te py
   udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca	udgrahItavyA DArayitavyA vAcayitavyA paryavAptavyA yoniSas ca
   manasikartavyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika te kulaputrāḥ	manasi kartavyAH. tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi kOSika te kula putrAH
   kuladuhitaraś caivaṃ jñāsyanti, atra hi tathāgataḥ pūrvaṃ	kula duhitaraH ca evam jQAsyanti, atra hi taTAgataH pUrvam
   bodhisattvacārikāṃ śikṣito yad uta prajñāpāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ	boDisattva cArikAm SikzitaH yat uta prajQApAramitAyAm DyAna pAramitAyAm
   vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramitāyām.	vIrya pAramitAyAm kzAnti pAramitAyAm SIla pAramitAyAm dAna pAramitAyAm.
   adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāyām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ	aDyAtma SUnyatAyAm bahirDA SUnyatAyAm aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatAyAm
   śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ mahāśūnyatāyāṃ paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyām	SUnyatA SUnyatAyAm mahA SUnyatAyAm parama arTa SUnyatAyAm saMskRta SUnyatAyAm

   pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva kauśika svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā	pratisatkartavyA. tat kasya hetoH? ezA eva kOSika sva lakzaNa SUnyatA
   sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ	sarva SrAvaka pratyekabudDAnAm boDisattvAnAm ca mahAsattvAnAm pratiSaraNam
   yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ, anupalambhaśūnyataiva	yAvat sa deva mAnuza asurAyAH prajAyAH pratiSaraNan, anupalamBa SUnyatA eva
   (ŚsP_II 4_40) taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣaiva	(ŚsP_II 4_40) tEH pratisatkartavyA. tat kasya hetoH? ezA eva
   kauśikānupalambhaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca	kOSika anupalamBa SUnyatA sarva SrAvaka pratyekabudDAnAm boDisattvAnAm ca

   pratiśaraṇaṃ, abhāvaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?	pratiSaraNan, aBAva SUnya tA eva tEH pratisatkartavyA. tat kasya hetoH?

   [K. 181a21, N. 352a4, T. 284a11, P. 200a7, Ch. 576a6]	[K. 181a21, N. 352a4, T. 284a11, P. 200a7, Ch. 576a6]
   yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgate parinirvṛte	yaH hi kaScid kOSika kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA taTAgate parinirvRte
   pūjāyai saptaratnamayaṃ stūpaṃ kārayed yojanamuccaitvenārdhayojanaṃ	pUjAyE sapta ratna mayam stUpam kArayet yojanam uccEtvena arDa yojanam
   vistareṇāyāṃ yāvaj jīvaṃ divyaiś puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair	vistareNa AyAm yAvat jIvam divyEH puzpEH divyEH mAlyEH divyEH ganDEH 
   divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyaiś chattrair	divyEH vilepanEH divyEH cUrNEH divyEH cIvarEH divyEH CattrEH 
   divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyair vādyaiḥ satkuryā gurukuryād	divyEH DvajEH divyABiH patAkABiH divyEH vAdyEH satkuryA gurukuryAt 
   mānayet pūjayet. tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā	mAnayet pUjayet. tat kim manyase? kOSikA api nu sa kula putraH vA kula duhitA
   vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.	vA tatonidAnam bahu puNyam prasavet .
   śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.	SakraH Aha: bahu Bagavan bahu sugata.
   bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ	BagavAn Aha: atas sa kOSika kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA bahutaram

   kuladuhitā vā tathāgataparinirvṛte, imaṃ jāmbūdvīpaṃ saptaratnamayais	kula duhitA vA taTAgata parinirvRte, imam jAmbUdvIpam sapta ratna mayEH

   śakra āha: ataḥ sa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ	SakraH Aha: atas sa Bagavan kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA bahutaram puNyam
   prasavati, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati	prasavati, yaH imAm prajQApAramitAm liKitvA udgrahIzyati DArayizyati

   prajñāpāramitāyām antargatāḥ sarve kuśalā dharmās tad yathā daśa kuśalaḥ	prajQApAramitAyAm antargatAH sarve kuSalAH DarmAH tat yaTA daSa kuSalaH

   ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ.	ArUpya samApattayaH.
   dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā	dAna pAramitA SIla pAramitA kzAnti pAramitA vIrya pAramitA DyAna pAramitA
   prajñāpāramitā.	prajQApAramitA.

   mahākaruṇā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ sarvajñatā mārgākārajñatā	mahA karuNAH azwAdaSa AveNikAH budDa DarmAH sarvajQa tA mArga AkAra jQa tA

   sarvajñatā prajñāpāramitāniryātā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāniryātā	sarvajQa tA prajQApAramitA niryAtA DyAna pAramitA prajQApAramitA niryAtA
   vīryapāramitā prajñāpāramitāniryātā kṣāntipāramitā prajñāpāramitāniryātā	vIrya pAramitA prajQApAramitA niryAtA kzAnti pAramitA prajQApAramitA niryAtA

   śūnyatāśūnyatā prajñāpāramitāniryātā, mahāśūnyatā prajñāpāramitāniryātā,	SUnyatA SUnyatA prajQApAramitA niryAtA, mahA SUnyatA prajQApAramitA niryAtA,

   abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā prajñāpāramitāniryātā.	aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA prajQApAramitA niryAtA.
   smṛtyupasthānāni prajñāpāramitāniryātāni, samyakprahāṇāni	smRti upasTAnAni prajQApAramitA niryAtAni, samyak prahANAni
   prajñāpāramitāniryātāni, ṛddhipādāḥ prajñāpāramitāniryātāḥ, indriyāṇi	prajQApAramitA niryAtAni, RdDi pAdAH prajQApAramitA niryAtAH, indriyANi
   prajñāpāramitāniryātāni, balāni prajñāpāramitāniryātāni, bodhyaṅgāni	prajQApAramitA niryAtAni, balAni prajQApAramitA niryAtAni, boDi aFgAni
   prajñāpāramitāniryātāni, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ prajñāpāramitāniryātaḥ,	prajQApAramitA niryAtAni, Arya azwa aFgaH mArgaH prajQApAramitA niryAtaH,
   āryasatyāni prajñāpāramitāniryātāni, dhyānāni prajñāpāramitāniryātāni,	Arya satyAni prajQApAramitA niryAta ani, DyAnAni prajQApAramitA niryAtAni,

   samanvāhareyaṃ smṛtyā ca svādhyāyaṃ kuryāt.	samanvAhareyam smRtyA ca svADyAyam kuryAt .

   cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ, mārgākārajñatā mārgākārajñatayā śūnyā. tat	ca advayam etat at vEDIkAraM, mArga AkAra jQa tA mArga AkAra jQa tayA SUnyA. tat 
   kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi mārgākārajñatā ca pāramitā cādvayam etad	kasya hetoH? taTA hi mArga AkAra jQa tA ca pAramitA ca advayam etat 
   advaidhīkāram. anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ samyaksaṃbodhyā śūnyā. tat kasya	advEDIkAram. anuttarA samyaksaMboDiH samyaksaMboDyA SUnyA. tat kasya
   hetoh? tathā hi bodhisattvāś ca pāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.	hetoh? taTA hi boDisattvAH ca pAramitA ca advayam etat advEDIkAram.
   [K. 190a6, N. 373a2, T. 298b8, P. 237b2, Ch. 687b2]	[K. 190a6, N. 373a2, T. 298b8, P. 237b2, Ch. 687b2]
   tasmāt tarhy ānanda prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ	tasmAt tarhi Ananda prajQApAramitA eva pUrvaFgamAH AsAm paQcAnAm pAramitAnAm

   tad yathāpi nāmānanda mahāpṛthivyāṃ bījāni prakīrṇāni sāmāgrī labhamānāni	tat yaTA api nAma Ananda mahA pRTivyAm bIjAni prakIrNAni sAma agrI laBamAnAni

   śroṣyati, tasyāś ca prajñāpāramitāyā arthaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ śroṣyati.	Srozyati, tasyAH ca prajQApAramitAyAH arTam viBajyamAnam Srozyati.

   vādyaiḥ, sa devakena lokena samārakena saśravaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ,	vAdyEH, sa devakena lokena sa mArakena sa SravaNa brAhmaNikAyAH prajQAyAH,
   yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladhitā vā jāmbūdvīpakān sattvān	yaH hi kaScid kOSika kula putraH vA kulaDitAH vA jAmbUdvIpakAn sattvAn
   daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu	daSasu kuSalezu karma paTezu pratizWApayet. tat kim manyase? kOSikA api nu
   sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.	sa kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA tatonidAnam bahu puNyam prasavet .
   āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.	Aha: bahu Bagavan bahu sugata.
   bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ	BagavAn Aha: atas sa kOSika kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA bahutaram puNyam
   prasavet, yo 'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pustakaṃ parasmai dadyāt, paṭhanāya	prasavet, yaH asyAH prajQApAramitAyAH pustakam parasmE dadyAt, paWanAya
   vā likhanāya vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyām	vA liKanAya vAcanAya vA. tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi atra prajQApAramitAyAm
   anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca	anAsravAH DarmAH vistareNa upadizwAH yatra kula putrAH kula duhitaraH ca
   śikṣitva samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti ca,	Sikzitva samyak tvanyAmam avakrAntAH avakrAmanti avakramizyanti ca,
   srotaapattiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca, sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ	srotaa patti Palam prAptAH prApnuvanti prApsyanti ca, sakRdAgAmi Palam
   prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca, anāgāmiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti	prAptAH prApnuvanti prApsyanti ca, anAgAmi Palam prAptAH prApnuvanti
   prāpsyanti ca, arhattvaṃ praptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,	prApsyanti ca, arhat tvam praptAH prApnuvanti prApsyanti ca,
   pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti (ŚsP_II 4_127)	pratyekabudDa yAnikAH pratyeka boDim prAptAH prApnuvanti (ŚsP_II 4_127)
   prāpsyanti ca, bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāntā	prApsyanti ca, boDisattvAH mahAsattvA boDisattva niyAmam avakrAntA
   avakramanty avakramiṣyanti ca, anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā	avakramanti avakramizyanti ca, anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMbudDA
   abhisaṃbudhyante 'bhisaṃbhotsyante ca.	aBisaMbuDyante aBisaMBotsyante ca.
   katame ca te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā	katame ca te kOSikAn AsravAH DarmAH tat yaTA dAna pAramitA SIla pAramitA
   kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramita dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā.	kzAnti pAramitA vIrya pAramita DyAna pAramitA prajQApAramitA.
   adhyātmaśūnyatā, bahirdhāśūnyatā, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā, śūnyatāśūnyatā,	aDyAtma SUnyatA, bahirDA SUnyatA, aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA, SUnyatA SUnyatA,
   mahāśūnyatā, paramārthaśūnyatā, saṃskṛtaśūnyatā, asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā,	mahA SUnyatA, parama arTa SUnyatA, saMskRta SUnyatA, asaMskRta SUnyatA,
   atyantaśūnyatā, anavarāgraśūnyatā, anavakāraśūnyatā, prakṛtiśūnyatā,	atyanta SUnyatA, anavara agra SUnyatA, anavakAra SUnyatA, prakRti SUnyatA,
   sarvadharmaśūnyatā, svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā, anupalambhaśūnyatā, abhāvaśūnyatā,	sarva Darma SUnyatA, sva lakzaNa SUnyatA, anupalamBa SUnyatA, aBAva SUnyatA,
   svabhāvaśūnyatā, abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā.	svaBAva SUnyatA, aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA.
   catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ,	catvAri smRti upasTAnAni, catvAri samyak prahANAni, catvAraH RdDi pAdAH,
   pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry	paQca indriyANi, paQca balAni, sapta boDi aFgAni Arya azwa aFgaH mArgaH catvAri

   mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā upadiṣṭāḥ. tad anenāpi te kauśika	mahA upekzAH anye ca aparimANAH budDa DarmAH upadizwAH. tat anena api te kOSika
   paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ, yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ	paryAyeNa evam veditavyan, yaH kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA prajQApAramitAm
   pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi,	pusta kaliKitAm kRtvA pareByaH dadyAt paWanAya api leKanAya api vAcanAya api,

   prajñāyate, mahāśūnyatā prajñāyate, paramārthaśūnyatā prajñāyate,	prajQAyate, mahA SUnyatA prajQAyate, parama arTa SUnyatA prajQAyate,
   saṃskṛtaśūnyatā prajñāyate, asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā prajñāyate, atyantaśūnyatā	saMskRta SUnyatA prajQAyate, asaMskRta SUnyatA prajQAyate, atyanta SUnyatA
   prajñāyate, anavarāgraśūnyatā prajñāyate, anavakāraśūnyatā prajñāyate,	prajQAyate, anavara agra SUnyatA prajQAyate, anavakAra SUnyatA prajQAyate,
   prakṛtiśūnyatā prajñāyate, sarvadharmaśūnyatā prajñāyate,	prakRti SUnyatA prajQAyate, sarva Darma SUnyatA prajQAyate,
   svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā prajñāyate, anupalambhaśūnyatā prajñāyate, abhāvaśūnyatā	sva lakzaNa SUnyatA prajQAyate, anupalamBa SUnyatA prajQAyate, aBAva SUnyatA
   prajñāyate, svabhāvaśūnyatā prajñāyate, abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā prajñāyate.	prajQAyate, svaBAva SUnyatA prajQAyate, aBAva svaBAva SUnyatA prajQAyate.
   smṛtyupasthānāni prajñāyante, samyakprahāṇāni prajñāyante, ṛddhipādāḥ	smRti upasTAnAni prajQAyante, samyak prahANAni prajQAyante, RdDi pAdAH
   prajñāyante, indriyāṇi prajñāyante, balāni prajñāyante, bodhyaṅgāni	prajQAyante, indriyANi prajQAyante, balAni prajQAyante, boDi aFgAni
   prajñāyante, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ prajñāyate, āryasatyāni prajñāyante,	prajQAyante, Arya azwa aFgaH mArgaH prajQAyate, Arya satyAni prajQAyante,
   dhyānāni prajñāyante, apramāṇāni prajñāyante, ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ	DyAnAni prajQAyante, apramANAni prajQAyante, ArUpya samApattayaH
   prajñāyante, aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ prajñāyante, navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ	prajQAyante, azwO vimokzAH prajQAyante, nava anupUrva vihAra samApattayaH
   prajñāyante, śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni prajñāyante, abhijñāḥ	prajQAyante, SUnyatA nimitta apraNihita vimokza muKAni prajQAyante, aBijQAH
   prajñāyante, samādhayaḥ prajñāyante, dhāraṇīmukhāni prajñāyante,	prajQAyante, samADayaH prajQAyante, DAraNI muKAni prajQAyante,
   tathāgatabalāni prajñāyante, vaiśāradyāni prajñāyante, pratisaṃvidaḥ	taTAgata balAni prajQAyante, vESAradyAni prajQAyante, pratisaMvidaH
   prajñāyante, mahāmaitrī prajñāyate, mahākaruṇā prajñāyate,	prajQAyante, mahA mEtrI prajQAyate, mahA karuNA prajQAyate,
   āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ prajñāyante, srotaāpattiphalaṃ prajñāyate,	AveNika budDa DarmAH prajQAyante, srotaApatti Palam prajQAyate,
   sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prajñāyate, anāgāmiphalaṃ prajñāyate, arhattvaṃ	sakRdAgAmi Palam prajQAyate, anAgAmi Palam prajQAyate, arhat tvam
   prajñāyate, pratyekabodhiṃ prajñāyate, mārgākārajñatā prajñāyate,	prajQAyate, pratyeka boDim prajQAyate, mArga AkAra jQa tA prajQAyate,
   sarvākārajñatā prajñāyate, srotaāpannāḥ prajñāyante, sakṛdāgāminaḥ	sarva AkAra jQa tA prajQAyate, srotaApannAH prajQAyante, sakRdAgAminaH
   prajñāyante, anāgāminaḥ prajñāyante, arhantaḥ prajñāyante, pratyekabuddhāḥ	prajQAyante, anAgAminaH prajQAyante, arhantaH prajQAyante, pratyekabudDAH
   prajñāyante, bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāyante, tathāgatā arhantaḥ	prajQAyante, boDisattvAH mahAsattvAH prajQAyante, taTAgatAH arhantaH
   samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ prajñāyante.	samyaksaMbudDAH prajQAyante.
   [K. 1    , N. 405a6, T. 324b4, P. 291b7, Ch. 717a8]	[K. 1   , N. 405a6, T. 324b4, P. 291b7, Ch. 717a8]
   tiṣṭhantu kauśika sahasracūḍikā lokadhātuḥ yāvantaḥ kauśika dvisāhasre	tizWantu kOSika sahasracUxikAH lokaDAtuH yAvantaH kOSika dvi sAhasre
   madhyame lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā	maDyame lokaDAtO sattvAH tAn kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA
   daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase kauśikāpi nu	daSasu kuSalezu karma paTezu pratizWApayet. tat kim manyase kOSikA api nu
   sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.	sa kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA tatonidAnam bahu puNyam prasavet .
   śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.	SakraH Aha: bahu Bagavan bahu sugata.
   bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ	BagavAn Aha: atas sa kOSika kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA bahutaram puNyam
   prasavet, yo syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pustakaṃ parasmai dadyāt, paṭhanāya vā	prasavet, yaH syAH prajQApAramitAyAH pustakam parasmE dadyAt, paWanAya vA
   lekhanāya vā vacanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra (ŚsP_II 4_134)	leKanAya vA vacanAya vA. tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi atra (ŚsP_II 4_134)
   kauśika prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra	kOSika prajQApAramitAyAm anAsravAH DarmAH vistareNa upadizwAH yatra
   kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntā,	kula putrAH kula duhitaraH ca SikzitvA samyak tvanyAmam avakrAntA,
   avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti ca, srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti	avakrAmanti avakramizyanti ca, srotaApatti Palam prAptAH prApnuvanti
   prāpsyanti ca, sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,	prApsyanti ca, sakRdAgAmi Palam prAptAH prApnuvanti prApsyanti ca,
   anāgāmiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca, arhattvaṃ prāptāḥ	anAgAmi Palam prAptAH prApnuvanti prApsyanti ca, arhat tvam prAptAH
   prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca, pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ	prApnuvanti prApsyanti ca, pratyekabudDa yAnikAH pratyeka boDim prAptAH
   prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca, bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvā bodhisattvanyāmam	prApnuvanti prApsyanti ca, boDisattvAH ca mahAsattvAH boDisattvan yAmam
   avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti, anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim	avakrAntAH avakrAmanti avakramizyanti, anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim
   abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante abhisaṃbhotsyante ca,	aBisaMbudDAH aBisaMbuDyante aBisaMBotsyante ca,
   katame ca te kauśikānāsrava dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā, śīlapāramitā	katame ca te kOSikAn Asrava DarmAH tat yaTA dAna pAramitA, SIla pAramitA
   kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā.	kzAnti pAramitA vIrya pAramitA DyAna pAramitA prajQApAramitA.
   adhyātmaśūnyatā, bahirdhāśūnyatā, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā, śūnyatāśūnyatā,	aDyAtma SUnyatA, bahirDA SUnyatA, aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA, SUnyatA SUnyatA,

   catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ,	catvAri smRti upasTAnAni, catvAri samyak prahANAni, catvAraH RdDi pAdAH,

   āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvaviharasamāpattayaḥ	Arya satyAni azwO vimokzAH nava anupUrva vihara samApattayaH

   pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ, mahāmaitri mahākaruṇā	pratisaMvidaH azwAdaSa AveNikAH budDa DarmAH, mahAmEtri mahA karuNA

   anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ, yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā	anena api te kOSika paryAyeNa evam veditavyan, yaH kula putraH vA kula duhitA

   upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante, brāhmaṇamahāśālakulāni	upadizwAH yEH kzatriya mahA SAla kulAni prajQAyante, brAhmaNa mahASAla kulAni

   ārūpyasamāpttiṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet pañcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ	ArUpya samApttizu pratizWApayet paQcasu aBijQAsu pratizWApayet. tat kim
   manyase? kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ	manyase? kOSikA api nu sa kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA tatonidAnam bahutaram
   puṇyaṃ prasavet.	puNyam prasavet .
   āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.	Aha: bahu Bagavan bahu sugata.
   bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ	BagavAn Aha: atas sa kOSika kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA bahutaram puNyam
   prasavet, yo 'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pustakaṃ parasmai dadyāt, paṭhanāya	prasavet, yaH asyAH prajQApAramitAyAH pustakam parasmE dadyAt, paWanAya
   vā lekhanāya vā vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atra (ŚsP_II 4_146)	vA leKanAya vA vAcanAya vA. tat kasya hetoH? taTA hi atra (ŚsP_II 4_146)
   prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā, yatra kulaputrāḥ	prajQApAramitAyAm anAsravAH DarmAH vistareNa upadizwA, yatra kula putrAH
   kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntā avakramanty	kula duhitaraH ca SikzitvA samyak tvanyAmam avakrAntAH avakramanti 
   avakramiṣyanti ca, srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,	avakramizyanti ca, srotaApatti Palam prAptAH prApnuvanti prApsyanti ca,

   prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca, arhattvaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,	prApnuvanti prApsyanti ca, arhat tvam prAptAH prApnuvanti prApsyanti ca,
   pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,	pratyekabudDa yAnikAH pratyeka boDim prAptAH prApnuvanti prApsyanti ca,

   abhisaṃbhotsyate ca.	aBisaMBotsyate ca.
   katame ca te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā, śīlapāramitā	katame ca te kOSikAn AsravAH DarmAH tat yaTA dAna pAramitA, SIla pAramitA
   kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā.	kzAnti pAramitA vIrya pAramitA DyAna pAramitA prajQApAramitA.
   adhyātmaśūnyatā, bahirdhāśūnyatā, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā, śūnyatāśūnyatā,	aDyAtma SUnyatA, bahirDA SUnyatA, aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA, SUnyatA SUnyatA,
   mahāśūnyatā, paramārthaśūnyatā, saṃskṛtaśūnyatā, asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā,	mahA SUnyatA, parama arTa SUnyatA, saMskRta SUnyatA, asaMskRta SUnyatA,
   atyantaśūnyatā, anavarāgraśūnyatā, anavakāraśūnyatā, prakṛtiśūnyatā,	atyanta SUnyatA, anavara agra SUnyatA, anavakAra SUnyatA, prakRti SUnyatA,

   pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry	paQca indriyANi, paQca balAni, sapta boDi aFgAni Arya azwa aFgaH mArgaH catvAri 
   āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ	Arya satyAni azwO vimokzAH nava anupUrva vihAra samApattayaH

   pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ, mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā	pratisaMvidaH azwAdaSa AveNikA budDa DarmAH, mahAmEtrI mahA karuNA

   dhyānāni samāpadyamānasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dhyānāni samāpadya imāni	DyAnAni samApadyamAnasya evam Bavati aham DyAnAni samApadya imAni
   dhyānāni samāpadyetasyaivaṃ dhyānāni samāpadyamānasya dhyānāny eva	DyAnAni samApadyetasya evam DyAnAni samApadyamAnasya DyAnAni eva

   prajñaiva sthāsyati na prajñāpāramitā upalambhayogena.	prajQA eva sTAsyati na prajQApAramitA upalamBa yogena.
   evaṃ khalu kauśikopalambhacaritasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā na	evam Kalu kOSika upalamBa caritasya kula putrasya vA kula duhituH vA na
   dānapāramitā paripūryate na śīlapāramitā paripūryate na kṣāntipāramitā	dAna pAramitA paripUryate na SIla pAramitA paripUryate na kzAnti pAramitA
   paripūryate na vīryapāramitā paripūryate na dhyānapāramitā paripūryate na	paripUryate na vIrya pAramitA paripUryate na DyAna pAramitA paripUryate na
   prajñāpāramitā paripūryate.	prajQApAramitA paripUryate.
   śakra āha: kathaṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya	SakraH Aha: kaTam carataH Bagavan boDisattvasya mahAsattvasya
   dānapāramitā paripūryate? kathaṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya	dAna pAramitA paripUryate? kaTam carataH Bagavan boDisattvasya
   mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitā paripūryate? kathaṃ carato bhagavan	mahAsattvasya SIla pAramitA paripUryate? kaTam carataH Bagavan

   paripūryate?	paripUryate?

   upalabhate na dānaṃ pratigrāhakam upalabhate, na śīlaṃ rakṣan na śīlaṃ na	upalaBate na dAnam pratigrAhakam upalaBate, na SIlam rakzan na SIlam na
   śīlasamādānam upalabhate, na kṣāntiṃ bhāvayan na kṣāntiṃ rakṣanti bhāvanām	SIla samAdAnam upalaBate, na kzAntim BAvayan na kzAntim rakzanti BAvanAm

   prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikayāṃ cariṣyanti,	prajQApAramitA prativarNikayAm carizyanti,
   manovijñānam anityam ity upadekṣyanti, manovijñānaṃ duḥkham ity	manaH vijQAnam anityam iti upadekzyanti, manaH vijQAnam duHKam iti 
   upadekṣyanti, manovijñānam anātmety upadekṣyanti, manovijñānam aśubham ity	upadekzyanti, manaH vijQAnam anAtmA iti upadekzyanti, manaH vijQAnam aSuBam iti 
   upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	upadekzyanti. evam ca vakzyanti yaH evam carati sa prajQApAramitAyAm
   caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti. te manovijñānam anityam iti gaveṣiṣyante,	carati iti yezAm ca upadekzyanti. te manaH vijQAnam anityam iti gavezizyante,

   carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti, te	carati sa prajQApAramitAyAm carati iti yezAm ca upadekzyanti, te
   jihvāsaṃsparśajāvedanām anityeti gaveṣiṣyante, jihvāsaṃsparśajāvedanāṃ	jihvA saMsparSa jAvedanAm anityA iti gavezizyante, jihvA saMsparSa jA vedanAm
   duḥkheti gaveṣiṣyante, jihvāsaṃsparśajāvedanām anātmeti gaveṣiṣyante,	duHKa iti gavezizyante, jihvA saMsparSa ja AvedanAm anAtmA iti gavezizyante,

   anātmeti gaveṣiṣyante, atyantaśūnyatām aśubheti gaveṣiṣyante, te	anAtmA iti gavezizyante, atyanta SUnyatAm aSuBa iti gavezizyante, te
   'tyantaśūnyatām anityeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ, atyantaśūnyatāṃ duḥkheti	atyanta SUnyatAm anityA iti gavezamANAH, atyanta SUnyatAm duHKa iti
   gaveṣamāṇāḥ, (ŚsP_II 4_203) atyantaśūnyatām anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ	gavezamANAH, (ŚsP_II 4_203) atyanta SUnyatAm anAtmA iti gavezamANAH
   atyantaśūnyatām aśubheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ	atyanta SUnyatAm aSuBa iti gavezamANAH prajQApAramitA prativarNikAyAm
   cariṣyanti,	carizyanti,
   anavarāgraśūnyatām anityety upadekṣyanti, anavarāgraśūnyatāṃ duḥkhety	anavara agra SUnyatAm anitya iti upadekzyanti, anavara agra SUnyatAm duHKa iti 
   upadekṣyanti, anavarāgraśūnyatām anātmety upadekṣyanti, anavarāgraśūnyatām	upadekzyanti, anavara agra SUnyatAm anAtmA iti upadekzyanti, anavara agra SUnyatAm
   aśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa	aSuBa iti upadekzyanti. evam ca vakzyanti yaH evam carati sa
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti, yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti, anavarāgraśūnyatām	prajQApAramitAyAm carati iti, yezAm ca upadekzyanti, anavara agra SUnyatAm
   anityeti gaveṣiṣyante, anavarāgraśūnyatāṃ duḥkheti gaveṣiṣyante,	anityA iti gavezizyante, anavara agra SUnyatAm duHKa iti gavezizyante,
   anavarāgraśūnyatām anātmeti gaveṣiṣyante, anavarāgraśūnyatām aśubheti	anavara agra SUnyatAm anAtmA iti gavezizyante, anavara agra SUnyatAm aSuBa iti
   gaveṣiṣyante, te 'navarāgraśūnyatām anityeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ,	gavezizyante, te anavara agra SUnyatAm anityA iti gavezamANAH,
   anavarāgraśūnyatāṃ duḥkheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ, anavarāgraśūnyatām anātmeti	anavara agra SUnyatAm duHKa iti gavezamANAH, anavara agra SUnyatAm anAtmA iti
   gaveṣamāṇāḥ anavarāgraśūnyatām aśubheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ	gavezamANAH anavara agra SUnyatAm aSuBa iti gavezamANAH
   prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,	prajQApAramitA prativarNikAyAm carizyanti,
   anavakāraśūnyatām anityety upadekṣyanti, anavakāraśūnyatāṃ duḥkhety	anavakAra SUnyatAm anitya iti upadekzyanti, anavakAra SUnyatAm duHKa iti

   aśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa	aSuBa iti upadekzyanti. evam ca vakzyanti yaH evam carati sa
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti, yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti, anavakāraśūnyatām	prajQApAramitAyAm carati iti, yezAm ca upadekzyanti, anavakAra SUnyatAm

   cariṣyanti,	carizyanti,

   samyakprahāṇāny aśubhānīty upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati	samyak prahANAni aSuBAni iti upadekzyanti. evam ca vakzyanti yaH evam carati
   sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti, te samyakprahāṇāny	sa prajQApAramitAyAm carati iti yezAm ca upadekzyanti, te samyak prahANAni 
   anityānīti gaveṣiṣyante, samyakprahāṇāni duḥkhānīti gaveṣiṣyante,	anityAni iti gavezizyante, samyak prahANAni duHKAni iti gavezizyante,
   samyakprahāṇāny anātmānīti gaveṣiṣyante, samyakprahāṇāny aśubhānīti	samyak prahANAni anAtmAni iti gavezizyante, samyak prahANAni aSuBAni iti
   gaveṣiṣyante, te samyakprahāṇāny anityānīti gaveṣamāṇāḥ, samyakprahāṇāni	gavezizyante, te samyak prahANAni anityAni iti gavezamANAH, samyak prahANAni
   duḥkhānīti gaveṣamāṇāḥ, samyakprahāṇāny anātmānīti gaveṣamāṇāḥ,	duHKAni iti gavezamANAH, samyak prahANAni anAtmAni iti gavezamANAH,
   samyakprahāṇāny aśubhānīti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ	samyak prahANAni aSuBAni iti gavezamANAH prajQApAramitA prativarNikAyAm
   cariṣyanti,	carizyanti,
   ṛddhipādān anityā ity upadekṣyanti, ṛddhipādān duḥkhā ity upadekṣyanti,	RdDi pAdAn anityAH iti upadekzyanti, RdDi pAdAn duHKAH iti upadekzyanti,
   ṛddhipādān anātmāna ity upadekṣyanti, ṛddhipādān aśubhā ity upadekṣyanti.	RdDi pAdAn anAtmAnaH iti upadekzyanti, RdDi pAdAn aSuBAH iti upadekzyanti.
   evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ	evam ca vakzyanti yaH evam carati sa prajQApAramitAyAm carati iti yezAm
   copadekṣyanti, te ṛddhipādān anityā iti gaveṣiṣyante, ṛddhipādāḥ duḥkhā	ca upadekzyanti, te RdDi pAdAn anityAH iti gavezizyante, RdDipAdAH duHKA
   iti gaveṣiṣyante, ṛddhipādān anātmāna iti gaveṣiṣyante, rṛddhipādān aśubhā	iti gavezizyante, RdDi pAdAn anAtmAnaH iti gavezizyante, rRdDi pAdAn aSuBA
   iti gaveṣiṣyante, te ṛddhipādān anityā iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ, ṛddhipādān duḥkhā	iti gavezizyante, te RdDi pAdAn anityAH iti gavezamANAH, RdDi pAdAn duHKA
   iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ, ṛddhipādān anātmāna iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ, ṛddhipādān	iti gavezamANAH, RdDi pAdAn anAtmAnaH iti gavezamANAH, RdDi pAdAn
   aśubhānīti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,	aSuBAni iti gavezamANAH prajQApAramitA prativarNikAyAm carizyanti,
   indriyāṇy anityānīty upadekṣyanti, indriyāṇi duḥkhānīty upadekṣyanti,	indriyANi anityAni iti upadekzyanti, indriyANi duHKAni iti upadekzyanti,
   indriyāṇy anātmānīty upadekṣyanti, indriyāṇy aśubhānīty upadekṣyanti. evaṃ	indriyANi anAtmAni iti upadekzyanti, indriyANi aSuBAni iti upadekzyanti. evam
   ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti, yeṣāṃ	ca vakzyanti yaH evam carati sa prajQApAramitAyAm carati iti, yezAm
   copadekṣyanti, te indriyāṇy anityānīti gaveṣiṣyante, indriyāṇi duḥkhānīti	ca upadekzyanti, te indriyANi anityAni iti gavezizyante, indriyANi duHKAni iti
   gaveṣiṣyante, indriyāṇy anātmānīti gaveṣiṣyante, indriyāṇy aśubhānīti	gavezizyante, indriyANi anAtmAni iti gavezizyante, indriyANi aSuBAni iti
   gaveṣiṣyante, te indriyāṇy anityānīti gaveṣamāṇāḥ, indriyāṇi duḥkhānīti	gavezizyante, te indriyANi anityAni iti gavezamANAH, indriyANi duHKAni iti
   gaveṣamāṇāḥ, indriyāṇy anātmānīti gaveṣamāṇāḥ, indriyāṇy aśubhānīti	gavezamANAH, indriyANi anAtmAni iti gavezamANAH, indriyANi aSuBAni iti
   gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,	gavezamANAH prajQApAramitA prativarNikAyAm carizyanti,
   balāny anityānīty upadekṣyanti, balāni duḥkhānīty upadekṣyanti, balāny	balAni anityAni iti upadekzyanti, balAni duHKAni iti upadekzyanti, balAni 
   anātmānīty upadekṣyanti, balāny aśubhānīty upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti	anAtmAni iti upadekzyanti, balAni aSuBAni iti upadekzyanti. evam ca vakzyanti
   ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti, te	yaH evam carati sa prajQApAramitAyAm carati iti yezAm ca upadekzyanti, te
   balāny anityānīti gaveṣiṣyante, balāni duḥkhānīti gaveṣiṣyante, balāny	balAni anityAni iti gavezizyante, balAni duHKAni iti gavezizyante, balAni

   cariṣyanti,	carizyanti,
   (ŚsP_II 4_207)	(ŚsP_II 4_207)
   bodhyaṅgāny anityānīty upadekṣyanti, bodhyaṅgāni duḥkhānity upadekṣyanti,	boDi aFgAni anityAni iti upadekzyanti, boDi aFgAni duHKAn iti upadekzyanti,

   śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāny anityānīty upadekṣyanti,	SUnyatA nimitta apraNihita vimokza muKAni anityAni iti upadekzyanti,
   śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni duḥkhānīty upadekṣyanti,	SUnyatA nimitta apraNihita vimokza muKAni duHKAni iti upadekzyanti,

   vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ	vakzyanti yaH evam carati sa prajQApAramitAyAm carati iti yezAm
   copadekṣyanti, te śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāny anityānīti	ca upadekzyanti, te SUnyatA nimitta apraNihita vimokza muKAni anityAni iti

   upadekṣyanti, anāgāmiphalam anātmety upadekṣyanti, anāgāmiphalam aśubham	upadekzyanti, anAgAmi Palam anAtmA iti upadekzyanti, anAgAmi Palam aSuBam
   ity upadekṣyanti, evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	iti upadekzyanti, evam ca vakzyanti yaH evam carati sa prajQApAramitAyAm
   caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti, te anāgāmiphalam anityam iti gaveṣiṣyante,	carati iti yezAm ca upadekzyanti, te anAgAmi Palam anityam iti gavezizyante,
   anāgāmiphalaṃ duḥkham iti gaveṣiṣyante, anāgāmiphalam anātmeti	anAgAmi Palam duHKam iti gavezizyante, anAgAmi Palam anAtmA iti
   gaveṣiṣyante, anāgāmiphalam aśubham iti gaveṣiṣyante, te anāgāmiphalam	gavezizyante, anAgAmi Palam aSuBam iti gavezizyante, te anAgAmi Palam
   anityam iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ, anāgāmiphalaṃ duḥkham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ,	anityam iti gavezamANAH, anAgAmi Palam duHKam iti gavezamANAH,
   anāgāmiphalam anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ, anāgāmiphalam aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ	anAgAmi Palam anAtmA iti gavezamANAH, anAgAmi Palam aSuBam iti gavezamANAH
   prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,	prajQApAramitA prativarNikAyAm carizyanti,

   iti gaveṣiṣyante, arhattvam anātmeti gaveṣiṣyante, arhattvam aśubham iti	iti gavezizyante, arhat tvam anAtmA iti gavezizyante, arhat tvam aSuBam iti

   śakra āha: katham upadiśanto bhagavaṃs te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca	SakraH Aha: kaTam upadiSantaH Bagavan te kula putrAH kula duhitaraH ca

   svabhāvaḥ so 'bhūvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyā prajñāpāramitā na tatra rūpaṃ	svaBAvaH saH aBUvaH sA prajQApAramitAyAH prajQApAramitA na tatra rUpam

   tat kasya hetoḥ? vedanāsvabhāvena śūnyāyā vedanāyāḥ svabhāva so 'bhāvo yo	tat kasya hetoH? vedanA svaBAvena SUnyAyAH vedanAyAH svaBAva saH aBAvaH yaH

   prajñāpāramitā, tatra na gandho nitya iti vā anitya iti vopalabhyate.	prajQApAramitA, tatra na ganDaH nityaH iti vA anityaH iti vA upalaByate.

   ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ svabhāvena śūnyaḥ yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśasya svabhāvaḥ so	GrANa saMsparSaH svaBAvena SUnyaH yaH GrANa saMsparSasya svaBAvaH saH 
   'bhāvo yo bhavaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā, yā prajñāpāramitā, tatra na	aBAvaH yaH BavaH sA prajQApAramitA, yA prajQApAramitA, tatra na
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśo nitya iti (ŚsP_II 4_222) vā anitya iti vopalabhyate.	GrANa saMsparSaH nityaH iti (ŚsP_II 4_222) vA anityaH iti vA upalaByate.
   ghrāṇasaṃsparśa eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā	GrANa saMsparSaH eva tatra na saMvidyate. kutas punar nityaH vA anityaH vA
   bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā na	Bavizyati. evam upadiSantaH kOSika te kula putrAH kula duhitaraH vA na

   cābdhātum anitya iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ? abdhātuḥ svabhāvena	ca abDAtum anityaH iti samanupaSya. tat kasya hetoH? abDAtuH svaBAvena
   śūnyo yo 'bdhātoḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhavaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā	SUnyaH yaH ap DAtoH svaBAvaH saH aBAvaH yaH aBavaH sA prajQApAramitA yA
   prajñāpāramitā, tatra nābdhātur nitya iti vā anitya iti vopalabhyate.	prajQApAramitA, tatra na abDAtuH nityaH iti vA anityaH iti vA upalaByate.
   abdhātur eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā	abDAtuH eva tatra na saMvidyate. kutas punar nityaH vA anityaH vA
   bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na	Bavizyati. evam upadiSantaH kOSika te kula putrAH vA kula duhitaraH vA na
   prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.	prajQApAramitA prativarNikAm upadekzyanti.
   punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ	punar aparam kOSika te kula putrAH kula duhitaraH ca tezAm
   bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām	boDisattva yAnikAnAm kula putrANAm kula duhitLNAm ca evam prajQApAramitAm
   upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca tejodhātum	upadekzyanti. ehi tvam kula putra prajQApAramitAm BAvaya mA ca tejaH DAtum
   anitya iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ? tejodhātuḥ svabhāvena śūnyo yas	anityaH iti samanupaSya. tat kasya hetoH? tejaH DAtuH svaBAvena SUnyaH yaH

   upadekṣyanti, ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca tṛṣṇām	upadekzyanti, ehi tvam kula putra prajQApAramitAm BAvaya mA ca tRzNAm

   svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra	svaBAvaH saH aBAvaH yaH aBAvaH sA prajQApAramitA yA prajQApAramitA tatra
   na tṛṣṇā nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate. tṛṣṇaiva tatra na saṃvidyate.	na tRzNA nitya iti vA anityA iti vA upalaByate. tRzNA eva tatra na saMvidyate.
   kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te	kutas punar nityaH vA anityaH vA Bavizyati. evam upadiSantaH kOSika te
   kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.	kula putrAH vA kula duhitaraH vA na prajQApAramitA prativarNikAm upadekzyanti.
   punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ	punar aparam kOSika te kula putrAH kula duhitaraH ca tezAm
   bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām	boDisattva yAnikAnAm kula putrANAm kula duhitLNAm ca evam prajQApAramitAm
   upadekṣyanti, ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā copādānam	upadekzyanti, ehi tvam kula putra prajQApAramitAm BAvaya mA ca upAdAnam
   anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ? upādānaṃ svabhāvena śūnyo ya	anityam iti samanupaSya. tat kasya hetoH? upAdAnam svaBAvena SUnyaH ya
   upādānasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyā	upAdAnasya svaBAvaH saH aBAvaH yaH aBAvaH sA prajQApAramitAyAH

   bahirdhāśūnyatām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ? bahirdhāśūnyatā	bahirDA SUnyatAm anityA iti samanupaSya. tat kasya hetoH? bahirDA SUnyatA
   svabhāvena śūnyā yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā	svaBAvena SUnyAH yaH bahirDA SUnyatAyAH svaBAvaH saH aBAvaH yaH aBAvaH sA
   prajñāpāramita yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na bahirdhāśūnyatā nityeti vā	prajQApAramita yA prajQApAramitA tatra na bahirDA SUnyatA nitya iti vA
   anityeti vopalabhyate. bahirdhāśūnyataiva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar	anityA iti vA upalaByate. bahirDA SUnyatA eva tatra na saMvidyate. kutas punar 
   nityā vā anityā vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā	nityAH vA anityA vA Bavizyati. evam upadiSantaH kOSika te kula putrAH vA
   kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.	kula duhitaraH vA na prajQApAramitA prativarNikAm upadekzyanti.
   punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ	punar aparam kOSika te kula putrAH kula duhitaraH ca tezAm
   bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām	boDisattva yAnikAnAm kula putrANAm kula duhitLNAm ca evam prajQApAramitAm
   upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā	upadekzyanti. ehi tvam kula putra prajQApAramitAm BAvaya mA
   cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?	ca aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatAm anityA iti samanupaSya. tat kasya hetoH?
   adhyātmabahirdhaśūnyatā svabhāvena śūnyā yo 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayaḥ	aDyAtma bahirDa SUnyatA svaBAvena SUnyAH yaH aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatayaH
   svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra	svaBAvaH saH aBAvaH yaH aBAvaH sA prajQApAramitA yA prajQApAramitA tatra
   nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate.	na aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA nitya iti vA anityA iti vA upalaByate.
   adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyataiva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityā vā	aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatA eva tatra na saMvidyate. kutas punar nityA vA
   anityā vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā	anityA vA Bavizyati. evam upadiSantaH kOSika te kula putrAH vA
   kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.	kula duhitaraH vA na prajQApAramitA prativarNikAm upadekzyanti.
   punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ	punar aparam kOSika te kula putrAH kula duhitaraH ca tezAm
   bodhisattvayānikānaṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām	boDisattva yAnikAnam kula putrANAm kula duhitLNAm ca evam prajQApAramitAm
   upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca	upadekzyanti. ehi tvam kula putra prajQApAramitAm BAvaya mA ca
   śūnyatāśūnyatām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ? śūnyatāśūnyatā	SUnyatA SUnyatAm anityA iti samanupaSya. tat kasya hetoH? SUnyatA SUnyatA
   svabhāvena śūnyā yaḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā	svaBAvena SUnyAH yaH SUnyatA SUnyatAyAH svaBAvaH saH aBAvaH yaH aBAvaH sA
   prajñāpāramitā (ŚsP_II 4_232) yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na śūnyatāśūnyatā	prajQApAramitA (ŚsP_II 4_232) yA prajQApAramitA tatra na SUnyatA SUnyatA
   nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate. śūnyatāśūnyataiva tatra na saṃvidyate.	nitya iti vA anityA iti vA upalaByate. SUnyatA SUnyatA eva tatra na saMvidyate.
   kutaḥ punar nityā vā anityā vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te	kutas punar nityAH vA anityA vA Bavizyati. evam upadiSantaH kOSika te
   kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.	kula putrAH vA kula duhitaraH vA na prajQApAramitA prativarNikAm upadekzyanti.
   punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ	punar aparam kOSika te kula putrAH kula duhitaraH ca tezAm
   bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām	boDisattva yAnikAnAm kula putrANAm kula duhitLNAm ca evam prajQApAramitAm
   upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca	upadekzyanti. ehi tvam kula putra prajQApAramitAm BAvaya mA ca
   mahāśūnyatām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ? mahāśūnyatā svabhāvena	mahA SUnyatAm anityA iti samanupaSya. tat kasya hetoH? mahA SUnyatA svaBAvena
   śūnyā yaḥ mahāśūnyatāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā	SUnyAH yaH mahA SUnyatAyAH svaBAvaH saH aBAvaH yaH aBAvaH sA prajQApAramitA
   yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na mahāśūnyatā nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate.	yA prajQApAramitA tatra na mahA SUnyatA nitya iti vA anityA iti vA upalaByate.
   mahāśūnyataiva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityā vā anityā vā	mahA SUnyatA eva tatra na saMvidyate. kutas punar nityAH vA anityA vA
   bhaviṣyati evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na	Bavizyati evam upadiSantaH kOSika te kula putrAH vA kula duhitaraH vA na
   prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.	prajQApAramitA prativarNikAm upadekzyanti.

   paramārthaśūnyatām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?	parama arTa SUnyatAm anityA iti samanupaSya. tat kasya hetoH?

   so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na	saH aBAvaH yaH aBAvaH sA prajQApAramitA yA prajQApAramitA tatra na
   paramārthaśūnyatā nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate. paramārthaśūnyataiva	parama arTa SUnyatA nitya iti vA anityA iti vA upalaByate. parama arTa SUnya tA eva

   saṃskṛtaśūnyatām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ? saṃskṛtaśūnyatā	saMskRta SUnyatAm anityA iti samanupaSya. tat kasya hetoH? saMskRta SUnyatA

   cātyantaśūnyatām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ? atyantaśūnyatā	ca atyanta SUnyatAm anityA iti samanupaSya. tat kasya hetoH? atyanta SUnyatA

   'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra nāryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo nitya	aBAvaH sA prajQApAramitA yA prajQApAramitA tatra nArya azwa aFgaH mArgaH nitya
   iti vā anitya iti vopalabhyate. āryāṣṭāṅgamārga eva tatra na saṃvidyate.	iti vA anityaH iti vA upalaByate. Arya azwa aFga mArgaH eva tatra na saMvidyate.

   kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.	kula putrAH vA kula duhitaraH vA na prajQApAramitA prativarNikAm upadekzyanti.

   upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā cāryasatyāny	upadekzyanti. ehi tvam kula putra prajQApAramitAm BAvaya mA ca Arya satyAni

   vaiśāradyāny anityānīti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ? vaiśāradyāni	vESAradyAni anityAni iti samanupaSya. tat kasya hetoH? vESAradyAni

   (ŚsP_II 4_244) hetoh? tathā hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saddharmo na saṃvidyate	(ŚsP_II 4_244) hetoh? taTA hi prajQApAramitAyAm sadDarmaH na saMvidyate

   na kaścid dharma āyūhitavyo vā niryūhitavyo vā utpādayitavyo vā	na kaScid DarmaH AyUhitavyaH vA niryUhitavyaH vE utpAdayitavyaH vA

   tiṣṭhantu kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau sattvā anuttarāyāṃ	tizWantu kOSika dvi sAhasre maDyame lokaDAtO sattvAH anuttarAyAm

   lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāyāṃ	lokaDAtO sattvAH tAn kaScid eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA anuttarAyAm
   samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase? kauśikāpi nu kulaputro vā	samyaksaMboDO samAdApayet. tat kim manyase? kOSikA api nu kula putraH vA
   kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.	kula duhitA vA tatonidAnam bahu puNyam prasavet .
   āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.	Aha: bahu Bagavan bahu sugata.
   bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ	BagavAn Aha: atas sa kOSika kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA bahutaram puNyam
   prasavet, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo	prasavet, yaH imAm prajQApAramitAm sArTAm sa vyaQjanAm pareByaH 
   vistareṇācakṣīt, deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt	vistareNa AcakzIt, deSayet prakASayet vicaret viBajet uttAnIkuryAt 
   saṃprakāśayed, evaṃ ca vaded ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa	saMprakASayed, evam ca vadet ehi tvam kula putra prajQApAramitAm udgRhANa
   paryavāpnuhy ādhāraya dhāraya vācaya yoniśaś ca manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ	paryavApnuhi ADAraya DAraya vAcaya yoniSas ca manasikuru yaTA upadizwAyAm
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva. yadā tvaṃ kulaputra yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ	prajQApAramitAyAm pratipadya sva. yadA tvam kula putra yaTA upadizwAyAm
   prajñāpāramitāṃ pratipatsyase. tadā tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ	prajQApAramitAm pratipatsyase. tadA tvam kula putra prajQApAramitAyAm
   śikṣiṣyase, yadā tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣiṣyase, tadā tvaṃ	Sikzizyase, yadA tvam kula putra prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzizyase, tadA tvam
   sarvajñatādharmān pratilapsyase, yadā tvaṃ sarvajñatādharmān	sarvajQa tA DarmAn pratilapsyase, yadA tvam sarvajQa tA DarmAn
   pratilapsyase. tadā te prajñāpāramitā bhūyasyā mātrayā bhāvanāparipūriṃ	pratilapsyase. tadA te prajQApAramitA BUyasyA mAtrayA BAvanA paripUrim
   gamiṣyati, yadā te prajñāpāramitā bhūyasyā mātrayā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ	gamizyati, yadA te prajQApAramitA BUyasyA mAtrayA BAvanA pAripUrim
   gamiṣyati, tadā tvam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase. tat kasya	gamizyati, tadA tvam anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim aBisaMBotsyase. tat kasya
   hetoḥ? ato niryātā hi kauśika prathamacittotpādikā bodhisattvā	hetoH? atas niryAtA hi kOSika praTama citta utpAdikA boDisattvA
   mahāsattvāḥ.	mahAsattvAH.

   samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitāḥ, yāvantaḥ kauśika daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyāṃ diśi	samyaksaMboDO samAdApitAH, yAvantaH kOSika daSasu dikzu ekEkasyAm diSi

   samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitāḥ, yāvantaḥ kauśika trisāhasre mahāsāhasre	samyaksaMboDO samAdApitAH, yAvantaH kOSika tri sAhasre mahA sAhasre
   lokadhātau sattvā avaivartyabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ, yāvantaḥ kauśika daśasu	lokaDAtO sattvAH avEvartya BUmO pratizWApitaH, yAvantaH kOSika daSasu
   dikṣv ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tān kaścid	dikzu ekEkasyAm diSi gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamezu lokaDAtuzu sattvAH tAn kaScid 
   eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā avaivartyabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ	eva kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA avEvartya BUmO pratizWApayet. tat kim
   manyase? kauśikāpi nu kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ	manyase? kOSikA api nu kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA tatonidAnam bahu puNyam
   prasavet.	prasavet .
   āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.	Aha: bahu Bagavan bahu sugata.
   bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ	BagavAn Aha: atas sa kOSika kula putraH vA kula duhitA vA bahutaram puNyam
   prasavet, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo	prasavet, yaH imAm prajQApAramitAm sArTAm sa vyaQjanAm pareByaH

   paryavāpnuhy ādhāraya dhāraya vācaya yoniśaś ca manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ	paryavApnuhi ADAraya DAraya vAcaya yoniSas ca manasikuru yaTA upadizwAyAm
   prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva. yadā tvaṃ kulaputra yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ	prajQApAramitAyAm pratipadya sva. yadA tvam kula putra yaTA upadizwAyAm

   prādurbhāvo bhavati, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,	prAdurBAvaH Bavati, aDyAtma bahirDA SUnyatAyAH loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati,
   śūnyatāśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati, mahāsunyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo	SUnyatA SUnyatAyAH loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati, mahA sunyatAyAH loke prAdurBAvaH 
   bhavati, paramārthasunyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati, saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā	Bavati, parama arTa sunyatAyAH loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati, saMskRta SUnyatAyAH 
   loke prādurbhāvo bhavati, asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,	loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati, asaMskRta SUnyatAyAH loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati,
   atyantaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati, anavarāgraśūnyatayā loke	atyanta SUnyatAyAH loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati, anavara agra SUnyatayA loke
   prādurbhāvo bhavati, anavakāraśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati	prAdurBAvaH Bavati, anavakAra SUnyatAyAH loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati
   prakṛtiśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati, sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā loke	prakRti SUnyatAyAH loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati, sarva Darma SUnyatAyAH loke
   prādurbhāvo bhavati, svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,	prAdurBAvaH Bavati, sva lakzaNa SUnyatAyAH loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati,
   anupalambhaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati, abhāvaśūnyatāyā loke	anupalamBa SUnyatAyAH loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati, aBAva SUnyatAyAH loke
   prādurbhāvo bhavati, svabhāvaśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,	prAdurBAvaH Bavati, svaBAva SUnyatAyAH loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati,
   abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati.	aBAva svaBAva SUnyatayA loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati.
   smṛtyupasthānānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati, samyakprahāṇānāṃ loke	smRti upasTAnAnAm loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati, samyak prahANAnAm loke
   prādurbhāvo bhavati, ṛddhipādānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati, indriyāṇāṃ	prAdurBAvaH Bavati, RdDi pAdAnAm loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati, indriyANAm
   devānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati, balānāṃ devānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo	devAnAm loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati, balAnAm devAnAm loke prAdurBAvaH 
   bhavati, bodhyaṅgānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati, āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya	Bavati, boDi aFgAnAm loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati, Arya azwa aFgasya mArgasya
   loke prādurbhāvo bhavati, āryasatyānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati, dhyānānāṃ	loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati, Arya satyAnAm loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati, DyAnAnAm
   loke prādurbhāvo bhavati, apramāṇānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,	loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati, apramANAnAm loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati,
   ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati, aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ loke	ArUpya samApattInAm loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati, azwAnAm vimokzANAm loke
   prādurbhāvo bhavati, navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ loke prādurbhāvo	prAdurBAvaH Bavati, nava anupUrva vihAra samApattInAm loke prAdurBAvaH 
   bhavati, śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,	Bavati, SUnyatA nimitta apraNihita vimokza muKAnAm loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati,
   abhijñānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati, samādhīnāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,	aBijQAnAm loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati, samADInAm loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati,
   dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati, daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ loke	DAraNI muKAnAm loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati, daSAnAm taTAgata balAnAm loke
   prādurbhāvo bhavati, caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,	prAdurBAvaH Bavati, caturNAm vESAradyAnAm loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati,
   catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati, mahāmaitryā loke	catasRNAm pratisaMvidAm loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati, mahAmEtryAH loke
   prādurbhāvo bhavati, mahākaruṇāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati, aṣṭādaśānām	prAdurBAvaH Bavati, mahA karuNAyAH loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati, azwAdaSAnAm
   āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati, śrāvakayānasya loke	AveNikAnAm budDa DarmAnAm loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati, SrAvaka yAnasya loke
   prādurbhāvo bhavati, pratyekabuddhasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,	prAdurBAvaH Bavati, pratyekabudDasya loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati,
   mahāyānasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati.	mahAyAnasya loke prAdurBAvaH Bavati.
   śatasāhasryāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śakraparivarto nāmas trayoviṃśatitamaḥ	Sata sAhasryAm prajQApAramitAyAm Sakra parivartaH nAmaH trayoviMSatitamaH
